General.Name: Compagnie des Alpes SA
General.Description: Compagnie des Alpes SA, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the operation of leisure facilities in France. The company operates through Ski Areas and Leisure Parks segments. The Ski Areas segment operates ski lifts; and maintains slopes. This segment also operates ski resorts. The Leisure Parks segment is involved in the operation of amusement parks, combined amusement and animal parks, water parks, waxwork museums, and tourist sites. Compagnie des Alpes SA was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
